thread.title: Hawaii Governor issues emergency proclamation for Tropical Storm Kilo
thread.title_full: Hawaii Governor issues emergency proclamation for Tropical Storm Kilo

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Hawaii Governor issues emergency proclamation for Tropical Storm Kilo
text:
Hawaii Governor issues emergency proclamation for Tropical Storm Kilo   
Aug 22, 2015 eTN   
HONOLULU, Hawaii - As of 11am, Tropical Storm Kilo is 480 miles SSE of Hilo and is moving WNW. Governor Ige has issued an emergency proclamation in anticipation of the arrival of the storm. The storm's track and strength are uncertain at this time, but it is important that we begin to prepare for its potential impacts which could bring heavy rain for the entire state starting on Sunday. 
For official updates, we recommend regularly checking the following websites, as well as tuning in to local broadcasts for information and instructions on Kilo: 
• Central Pacific Hurricane Center: www.weather.gov/cphc • Hawaii Emergency Management Agency: http://www.scd.hawaii.gov/
